title: The surge is on
author: VD
content_html:
The OC revives the Rebel Moon experiment:

Ergo, if you’d like to participate in this little experiment (and you’re willing to spend 4 bucks* to get a new copy of REBEL MOON) we’d appreciate it if you’d place your order on Saturday, July 28, 2007, preferably between the hours of midnight and noon U.S. Central time.

You want ’em signed? I can sign ’em. You want ’em personalized? You got that, too. As I said at the start: if anyone has any suggestions for making this offer more appealing, I am listening.

If you’re willing to dedicate $4 to science and the Amazon shareholders, do give it a whirl tomorrow.
